@poxvoculi, looking through [configure.py](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/c527d67d21f4b1d778ca92d3c3478c381aba5fd6/configure.py), these are the only variables I found:
```
CUDA_TOOLKIT_PATH
LD_LIBRARY_PATH
MPI_HOME
PYTHON_LIB_PATH
PYTHONPATH
TF_CUDA_CLANG
TF_DOWNLOAD_CLANG
TF_NEED_COMPUTECPP
TF_NEED_CUDA
TF_NEED_MPI
TF_NEED_OPENCL_SYCL
USE_DEFAULT_PYTHON_LIB_PATH
```

The gist you linked to uses these:
```
CC_OPT_FLAGS
CUDA_TOOLKIT_PATH
CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH
GCC_HOST_COMPILER_PATH
PYTHON_ARG
PYTHON_BIN_PATH
PYTHON_LIB_PATH
PYTHONPATH
TF_CUDA_CLANG
TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES
TF_CUDA_VERSION
TF_CUDNN_VERSION
TF_DOWNLOAD_MKL
TF_ENABLE_XLA
TF_NEED_CUDA
TF_NEED_GCP
TF_NEED_HDFS
TF_NEED_JEMALLOC
TF_NEED_MKL
TF_NEED_MPI
TF_NEED_OPENCL
TF_NEED_VERBS
```

Here's the diff:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5461398/44063593-672aaa4e-9f1e-11e8-8f24-1417ebaa1ddc.png)


There are some you include that are extra, and some that you don't include. Is there a complete list of options for configuring the build somewhere?

Edit: And documentation for each of those options - just trying to optimize an automatic build.
